content: I do not have access to real-time information and my database only includes information up until 2021. however, based on the latest draft and pre-season, the baltimore ravens have added some promising rookies to their roster. rashod bateman, a wide receiver from the university of minnesota, was selected in the first round of the 2021 nfl draft and is expected to bring speed and agility to the ravens' passing offense. in addition, the ravens also added some reinforcements to the defensive line through their draft picks like odafe oweh, a defensive end from penn state, and daelin hayes, a defensive end from notre dame, who could potentially make an impact on the team this season.
